info.title: SaaSHubCloudServicesClient
info.description: SaaSHub cloud service client provides lifecycle management features to SaaSHub cloud services.

get.description: Lists the SaaSHub cloud service under the subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the SaaSHub cloud services under the resource group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a SaaSHub cloud service by its ID. The operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a SaaSHub cloud service.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters that are provided to the create SaaSHub cloud service operation.

201.description: Created. The cloud service has been created.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates the properties of a SaaSHub cloud service.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters that are provided to the update SaaSHub cloud service operation.

Location.description: Location URI to poll for result

Retry-After.description: Recommended time to wait before making another request to check the status of the operation. The time is specified in seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes a SaaSHub cloud service resource.

Location.description: Location URI to poll for result

Retry-After.description: Recommended time to wait before making another request to check the status of the operation. The time is specified in seconds.

204.description: No Content. The resource does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Merges multiple cloud service resources into one target cloud service resource. The resource name in URL is the target, and the list of source cloud service resource and quantity will be specified in request payload

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters that are provided to the merge SaaSHub cloud service operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Evaluates whether the request payload can create a new resource. Currently only supports CloudService resource type.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters that are provided to the create SaaSHub cloud service operation.

200.description: Successfully evaluated payload. Result may be Passed or Failed.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Evaluates whether the request payload can update an existing cloud service resource.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters that are provided to the update SaaSHub cloud service operation.

200.description: Successfully evaluated payload. Result may be Passed or Failed.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Evaluates whether an existing cloud service resource can be cancelled.

200.description: Successfully evaluated payload. Result may be Passed or Failed.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Evaluates whether the source cloud service resource can be merged to target cloud service resource.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters that are provided to the merge SaaSHub cloud service operation.

200.description: Successfully evaluated payload. Result may be Passed or Failed.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

ListCloudServicesResult.description: The list of SaaSHub cloud service.

value.description: The list of SaaSHub cloud service.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

CloudServiceProperties.description: The properties of a SaaSHub cloud service.

autoRenew.description: Indicates whether auto renewal is turned on or off for a SaaSHub cloud service. The default value will be 'On' for products that support autorenew.

systemOverrides.description: System imposed policies that regulate behavior of the resource.

cancellation.description: The policy override for the resource indicates whether the self-serve cancellation or seat reduction is allowed.

cancellationAllowedEndDate.description: The end date in UTC time by when the self-serve cancellation ends.

displayName.description: The name of the cloud service.

productType.description: Type of the product for which the cloud service is purchased

productCode.description: Product Universal Product Number of the product

provisioningState.description: Gets the status of the SaaSHub cloud service at the time the operation was called.

quantity.description: The number of licenses purchased for the cloud service

renewalTerm.description: Renewal term details of the cloud service.

skuDescription.description: The SKU description of the product for which the cloud service is purchased.

status.description: The status of the cloud service.

suspensionReasons.description: The suspension reason for a cloud service.

term.description: Term details of the cloud service.

originalResourceUri.description: The original resource uri, if the new resource will be created by splitting part of the licenses from an existing resource

provisioningTenantId.description: The Id of the tenant where licenses will be provisioned for this resource. It will only be populated if licenses are provisioned in a different tenant.

TermDetails.description: Term details of the cloud service.

billingFrequency.description: Billing frequency of the product under the cloud service. Example P1Y and P1M

termUnit.description: The duration for which you can use the cloud service. Example P1Y and P1M

startDate.description: Start date of the term in UTC time.

endDate.description: End date of the term in UTC time. When there is a value passed in for PUT scenario, it is to support co-term scenario. When there is a value passed in for PATCH scenario, it is to support extend trial scenario. The time part passed in will be ignored

RenewalTermDetails.description: Renewal term details of the cloud service.

quantity.description: The number of licenses purchased for the cloud service

productCode.description: Upn value of the product, which can be used to resolve product Id/sku Id/availability Id/term Id

billingFrequency.description: Billing frequency of the product under the cloud service. Example P1Y and P1M

termUnit.description: The duration for which you can use the cloud service. Example P1Y and P1M

endDate.description: End date of the term in UTC time. It can be patched for co-term scenario, the time part passed in will be ignored

MergeCloudServiceRequest.description: Request to merge multiple cloud service resources into one target cloud service resource

sourceResources.description: List of source resources to be merged into target resource.

CanCreateRequest.description: Request to check if the resource can be created

type.description: The type of the resource, currently only support Microsoft.SaaSHub/cloudServices.

reasonCode.description: ReasonCode for why the request payload failed validation. Null when validation passed.

reason.description: Detailed reason for why the request payload failed validation. Null when validation passed.

addOn.description: Additional detail when request payload failed addOn constraints. Null when constraints passed or not applicable.

promotion.description: Additional detail when request payload failed promotion constraints. Null when constraints passed or not applicable.

isEligible.description: True if user is eligible for this promotion, false otherwise

futurePrice.description: Additional evaluation eligibility result for qualifying co-term resources for a future price concession. Null when constraints passed or not applicable.

termEndDate.description: The term end date in UTC time, for resources in this group.

totalQuantity.description: Total cumulative quantity of licenses for resources in this group.

isEligible.description: Whether the future price concession eligibility is satisfied by subscriptions in this group

qualifyingResources.description: List of qualifying resources for the future price concession

futurePriceConcessionTypes.description: Types of future price concession. E.g. FuturePriceNotToExceedCap, PercentageDiscount

minimumQuantityRequired.description: Minimum number of seats required to be eligible for the future price concession

coTermDates.description: Additional detail when request payload failed coTerm constraints. Null when constraints passed or not applicable.

coTermTarget.description: Target cloud resource or contract name to coTerm to.

coTermTargetType.description: Whether the target is cloud resource or contract.

termEndDate.description: CoTerm end date in UTC time.

isEligible.description: true if eligibility is satisfied, false otherwise

reasonCode.description: ReasonCode for why the request payload failed validation. Null when validation passed.

reason.description: Detailed reason for why the request payload failed validation. Null when validation passed.

updateScenario.description: Update scenario that was identified based on the canUpdate request body values.

refundableQuantity.description: Additional detail when request payload failed refundableQuantity constraints. Null when constraints passed or not applicable. Relevant scenarios: remove quantity.

coTermDates.description: Additional detail when request payload failed coTerm constraints. Null when constraints passed or not applicable. Relevant scenarios: coterm, scheduled conversion with coterm.

totalRefundableQuantity.description: Total refundable quantity at the time of the evaluation.

refundableQuantities.description: Batches of refundable quantity with their respective refund window end date.

returnWindowEndDateTime.description: The end date in UTC time by when the refund window ends.

reasonCode.description: ReasonCode for why the request payload failed validation. Null when validation passed.

reason.description: Detailed reason for why the request payload failed validation. Null when validation passed.

cancellationWindowEndTimestamp.description: The end date in UTC time by when the self-serve cancellation ends.

reasonCode.description: ReasonCode for why the request payload failed validation. Null when validation passed.

reason.description: Detailed reason for why the request payload failed validation. Null when validation passed.

MergeSourceCloudService.description: Cloud service to be used in merge operation as source.

quantity.description: The quantity of license to be merged

validationError.description: The validation error it ran into. Null when validation passed.

CloudServiceResourceNameParameter.name: CloudServiceResourceName
CloudServiceResourceNameParameter.description: The name that uniquely identifies a SaaSHub cloud service.
